title: Canceled—Virtual Talk: Home for the Holidays
hero_caption: George Bellows. Love of Winter, 1914. Friends of American Art Collection.
short_description: From joy to melancholy, celebration to reflection, the holiday season inspires different feelings in each of us. On this collaboratively led virtual tour, explore artworks that connect us with what makes the holidays meaningful.
list_description: On this collaboratively led virtual tour, explore artworks that connect us with what makes the holidays meaningful.
description:
This event has been canceled.

From joy to melancholy, celebration to reflection, the holiday season inspires different feelings in each of us. On this collaboratively led virtual tour, explore artworks that connect us with what makes the holidays meaningful. 

In order to allow for conversation and exchange, capacity for this program is limited. Explore all upcoming Virtual Talks.

This virtual event will be hosted on Zoom. Find Zoom tutorials and resources here. If you have any questions about virtual programming, please reach out to museum-programs@artic.edu.
